settings.title: Experience authentic Venetian artisan workshops with master craftspeople
settings.description: Learn traditional glass-blowing, mask-making, and gondola crafting techniques.

settings.title: Flexible scheduling - book experiences any day of the week
settings.description: Choose your preferred dates and times for maximum convenience.

settings.title: Start your journey at any of the three experience locations
settings.description: Begin your Venice adventure wherever is most convenient for you.

settings.title: Enjoy a 20% discount on standard rates
settings.description: Save money while experiencing the best of Venice's cultural offerings.

settings.title: You have one year from purchase to complete all three experiences
settings.description: Take your time and enjoy Venice at your own pace throughout the year.

settings.title: Venezia Pass
settings.main_title: Travel and Create, 3 experiences in Venice
settings.description: Discover the cultural treasures of Venice with unprecedented access to three premier institutions.
settings.pricing_note: Price valid for EU citizens over 65 and for all three museums
